          <title>
            <string language="hu">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="en">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Michaël Angelo : Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Michelangelo: Ignudo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Michelangelo: Ignudo, Részlet a Sixtus-kápolna mennyezetéről, 1508-1512, Róma, Palazzi Vaticani, Sixtus-kápolna, freskó, restaurálás előtt</string>
            <string language="en">Michelangelo: Ignudo, Detail about the ceiling of The Sixtus Chapel, 1508-1512, Rome, Palazzi Vaticani, Sixtus Chapel, fresco, before restoration</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Michelangelo Buonarroti,  cinquecento,  Sixtus-kápolna,  16. század,  Ignudo,  reneszánsz,  </string>
            <string language="en">Michelangelo Buonarroti,  cinquecento,  Sixtus Chapel,  16. century,  Ignudo,  renaissance,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Michelangelo: Ignudo, Detail über die 
Decke der Sixtus Kapelle, 1508-1512, Rom, Palazzi Vaticani, 
Sixtus Kapelle, Fresko, vor Wiederherstellung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Michaël Angelo : Ignudo, détail au sujet 
du plafond de la chapelle de Sixtus, 1508-1512, Rome, Palazzi 
Vaticani, chapelle de Sixtus, fresque, avant restauration</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Michelangelo: Ignudo, detalhe sobre o teto 
do chapel de Sixtus, 1508-1512, Roma, Palazzi Vaticani, chapel de 
Sixtus, fresco, antes da restauração</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Michelangelo: Ignudo, particolare circa il 
soffitto del chapel di Sixtus, 1508-1512, Roma, Palazzi Vaticani, 
chapel di Sixtus, fresco, prima di ripristino</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Michelangelo: Ignudo, λεπτομέρεια για το 
ανώτατο όριο του Sixtus παρεκκλησιού, 1508-1512, Ρώμη, 
Palazzi Vaticani, Sixtus παρεκκλησι, νωπογραφία, πριν από 
την αποκατάσταση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Michelangelo: Ignudo, detalle sobre el 
techo de la capilla de Sixtus, 1508-1512, Roma, Palazzi Vaticani, 
capilla de Sixtus, fresco, antes de la restauración</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Michelangelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, Sixtus 
Kapelle, 16. Jahrhundert, Ignudo, Renaissance,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Michaël Angelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, chapelle de 
Sixtus, 16. siècle, Ignudo, la Renaissance,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Michelangelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, chapel de Sixtus,
16. século, Ignudo, renascimento,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Michelangelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, chapel di Sixtus, 
16. secolo, Ignudo, rinascita,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Michelangelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, Sixtus 
παρεκκλησι, 16, αιώνας, Ignudo, αναγέννηση,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Michelangelo Buonarroti, cinquecento, capilla de 
Sixtus, 16. siglo, Ignudo, renacimiento,</string>
          </keyword>
